bibl.title: Pilgrimage in Graeco-Roman & Early Christian Antiquity. Seeing the Gods.
bibl.note: 17 papers. Many of them had their origin in a conference on pilgrimage (Seeing the Gods. Patterns of Pilgrimage in Graeco-Roman Antiquity) held at the University of Reading in July 2000. - Pp. 1-38: J.E. and I.R., Introduction; - 451-500: Bibliography; - 501-513: Index.
ELSNER Jas and Ian RUTHERFORD (Edd.), Pilgrimage in Graeco-Roman & Early Christian Antiquity. Seeing the Gods.
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2005, 8°, xviii-513 pp., 35 figg. ISBN 0-19-925079-0. £70.
